titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Gottlob Frege, [1911 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Inhaltsangabe (G. E. M. Anscombe und P. T. Geach: Three Philosophers. Oxford: Basil Blackwell 1973, S. 129).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: ["I wrote to Frege, putting forward some objections to his theories, and waited anxiously for a reply."]
